channel.title: Improvements relating to both activity and organisation standards
channel.description: The organisation standard paper contained a small piece on issues relating to both standards. This section has grown thanks to @hayfield's [forensic analysis](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lj5VQ2M1zzQ4uZ8cQZrzPGCC0JR7uckZUkUSpwElrYc/edit?usp=sharing) and it has now been [split off into its own paper which is available here.](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XCwTApd1NX3Rfc0p8-uxAskZ0NE8RIDxrzmojQdNYRY/edit?usp=sharing)

item.title: Improvements relating to both activity and organisation standards
item.dc:creator: Herman
item.description:
Great work: this will improve the usability of IATI data.

Read full topic
